resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/108168</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>108168</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1765085923</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Keys to success for English language learners</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Tasten zum Erfolg für englische 
Sprachenanfänger</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Clés au succès pour des étudiants d'anglais</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Chaves ao sucesso para learners de língua 
inglesa</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Tasti a successo per gli studenti di lingue 
inglesi</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κλειδιά για την επιτυχία για τους αρχαρίους αγγλικής 
γλώσσας</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Claves al éxito para los principiantes de 
lenguaje inglés</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Tips that any teacher in any classroom can use to help ESL students learn the curriculum while learning English.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Social Sciences</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Humanities</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Neigt, daß jeder möglicher Lehrer in irgendeinem
Klassenzimmer pflegen kann, ESL Kursteilnehmern zu helfen, den 
Lehrplan beim Lernen von von Englisch zu erlernen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Incline que n'importe quel professeur dans 
n'importe quelle salle de classe peut utiliser pour aider ESL des 
étudiants pour apprendre le programme d'études tout en apprenant 
l'anglais.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Derruba que todo o professor em qualquer sala de 
aula pode se usar ajudar a estudantes de ESL aprender o curriculum ao 
aprender o inglês.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Si capovolge che tutto l'insegnante in qualunque 
aula può usare aiutare gli allievi di ESL ad imparare il programma di
studi mentre impara l'inglese.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ακρες που οποιοσδήποτε δάσκαλος σε οποιαδήποτε τάξη 
μπορεί να χρησιμοποιήσει για να βοηθήσει τους σπουδαστές του 
ESL να μάθουν το πρόγραμμα σπουδών μαθαίνοντας τα αγγλικά.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Inclina que cualquier profesor en cualquier sala 
de clase puede utilizar ayudar a estudiantes de ESL a aprender el plan
de estudios mientras que aprende inglés.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sozialwissenschaften</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Menschlichkeit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les Sciences Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Sciences humaines</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciências Sociais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Humanities</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienze Sociali</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Studi umanistici</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κοινωνικές επιστήμες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ανθρωπότητες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencias Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Humanidad</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>roleValues</source>
              <value>author</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
N:AUDREY L. HEINING-BOYNTON
FN:AUDREY L. HEINING-BOYNTON
VERSION:3.0
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1765085923</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>LRE.roleMetaValues</source>
              <value>provider</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
VERSION:3.0
N:OERCommons
FN:OERCommons
ORG:OERCommons
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="x-t-cc-url">http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-sa/3.0/</string>
            <string language="en">Creative Commons Attribution-Noncommercial-Share Alike 2.5</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>108168</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/libraries/keys-to-success-for-english-language-learners</uri>
